// src/hooks/useAnimations.ts
export const containerVariants={hidden:{opacity:0},visible:{opacity:1,transition:{staggerChildren:0.2}}};export const itemVariants={hidden:{y:20,opacity:0},visible:{y:0,opacity:1,transition:{duration:0.5,ease:"easeOut"}}};export const fadeInUp={hidden:{opacity:0,y:60},visible:{opacity:1,y:0,transition:{duration:0.6,ease:[0.22,0.61,0.36,1]}}};export const staggerContainer={hidden:{opacity:0},visible:{opacity:1,transition:{staggerChildren:0.3,delayChildren:0.2}}};export const staggerItem={hidden:{opacity:0,y:30},visible:{opacity:1,y:0,transition:{duration:0.6,ease:[0.22,0.61,0.36,1]}}};export const smoothFloat={hidden:{y:0},visible:{y:[0,-15,0],transition:{duration:4,repeat:Infinity,ease:"easeInOut"}}};
